title: Account Hacked and banned without even an explanatory email by Riot
body:
Someone hacked my main account, which I've had since season 1 and spent thousands of dollars on, changed it's name to MYQQ and some numbers I don't remember, and next day it says it's permabbanned. I have never accessed to any boosting sites or anything, and the worst part is that I'm supposed to get an email from Riot asking for a passcode if someone tries to change my password, but I didn't get anything. Password changed, account banned, and no email explanations. Even if they changed the email linked to that account I shoulda still gotten a confirmation passcode to my email. I don't understand what's going on and I need help ASAP. Sent Riot support an email but no answers yet.
Help!!

replies.body:
Submitting a ticket was the best move here since you'll need to reach an account recovery specialist in order to sort this out. A specialist will reach back out as soon as possible. Given the context in your OP, I strongly recommend changing the password associated with your email in case the person who compromised your account also compromised your email.

Let me know if you have any questions.
